alert.note: Alert for Charles City; New Kent; Prince George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 10:29PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CHARLES CITY...NORTH CENTRAL PRINCE GEORGE AND SOUTH CENTRAL NEW KENT COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT... At 1029 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Charles City, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, half inch hail, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Charles City, Ruthville, and Adkins Store around 1035 PM EDT. Providence Forge around 1055 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mountcastle, Roaches Corner, New Hope, Chickahominy Shore, Sandybottom, and Lanexa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; New Kent; Prince George
